meanings.definition: The act of going to see someone or something
meanings.sent1: My visitings to the zoo always make me happy.
meanings.sent2: During the summer, our family often goes on visitings to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The visitings of the curious cat to the fish tank are always entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her visitings to the library were like a treasure hunt for new books.
meanings.sent5: The visitings of the birds to the bird feeder brought joy to the children.

meanings.definition: The act of staying temporarily in a place
meanings.sent1: After a long journey, our visitings at the hotel were much needed.
meanings.sent2: During the camping trip, our visitings in the forest were peaceful.
meanings.sent3: The visitings of the squirrel in our backyard treehouse were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His visitings in the haunted house felt like a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The visitings of the snow in our town made everything look magical.

meanings.definition: The act of making a formal call or inspection
meanings.sent1: The mayor's visitings to the new school building were well received.
meanings.sent2: During the visitings of the health inspector, the restaurant was spotless.
meanings.sent3: The visitings of the penguin to the tropical island caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her visitings to the art gallery were like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The visitings of the detective to the crime scene were thorough and meticulous.
